1370: Willem was born in Kerckstraet in 1370.
Got married to Alretieren at age 18 in 1370.
1398: Lost daughter Atghardis when Atghardis was 27 years old.
1371: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Atghardis, at age 19.
1372: Had a son with Alretieren, Wolbrand, at age 20.
1373: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Cofte, at age 21.
Lost son Wolbrand when Wolbrand was 2 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Liudburgis, at age 24.
1379: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Baua, at age 27.
1380: Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 8 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Siwa, at age 29.
Lost daughter Siwa when Siwa was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1382: Had a son with Alretieren, Jonas, at age 30.
1383: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Marcibilia, at age 31.
1387: Had a son with Alretieren, Dilane, at age 35.
1388: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Saswe, at age 36.
1391: Lost daughter Marcibilia when Marcibilia was 9 years old.
1395: Lost daughter Saswe when Saswe was 8 years old.
